DOC.brief_summary: Subjects will be asked to substitute their usual vitamin and mineral supplement/s with FruitiVits for seven consecutive days.
DOC.brief_title: A Taste and Acceptance Study of FruitiVits in Children Aged 4-8 Years Following a Ketogenic Diet.
DOC.detailed_description: The study will involve 12 subjects between 4 and 8 years of age, who routinely use comprehensive micronutrient supplementation as part of their dietary management. Primary Hypothesis: FruitiVits is an acceptable source of vitamin, mineral and trace elements for patients on a Ketogenic diet. Secondary Hypothesis: FruitiVits will be well accepted and tolerated when given orally to children on a Ketogenic diet.
DOC.criteria: 1. Diagnosis of condition requiring a Ketogenic diet 2. Currently on a Ketogenic diet 3. Aged 4 8 years 4. Routinely taking a complete micronutrient supplement 5. Oral feeding 1) Children aged less than 4 years or older than 9 years of age
